Description:
As DevOps I want to deploy via GitHub Actions on Railway so that each PR can be previewed
AC: build+start commands set, PORT=3000, /api/health reachable

As Security I want to rate limit 100 req/min/IP so that the API is protected
AC: 429 on overflow, test e2e included

As Dev I want a unit/e2e test skeleton so that regressions are caught early
AC: Jest + Supertest for API, Vitest for web, scripts run green
